name: sachet
effect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.
short_effect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
